About.label: About
About.title: About Me
About.paragraph1: I'm a front-end developer with a deep interest in modern web technologies, UI animations, and interactive user experiences. I work with React, Next.js, TypeScript, GSAP, Lenis, integrate external services (Cloudflare Stream, Stripe, Calendly), and optimize performance and design down to the pixel.
About.paragraph2: I have experience with Bubble.io, creating scalable no-code solutions with logic, dynamic filters, and custom interactions.
About.paragraph3: In my work, I value code cleanliness, logic, aesthetics, and efficiency. I constantly improve — from precise element positioning to building complex JavaScript architectures. I love when an interface doesn't just work, but comes alive.

work1.title: Front-End / Bubble Developer
work1.description: The previous company went through a rebranding, and since then I have continued working there part-time.

work2.title: Front-End / Bubble Developer
work2.description: Development of modern interactive and animated websites using HTML/SCSS/JS and libraries such as Highway, GSAP, and more — focused on performance optimization and exceptional UX. Also experienced in building web applications of various complexity on the Bubble.io platform.

work3.title: Online & offline clothing retail
work3.description: Went to buy goods in Turkey and China, communication with clients, improved customer-oriented service, created internet shop.

education1.title: Student (Full-stack Developer)
education1.description: Continuous learning through online platforms and documentation. Focused on modern technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js.
